recipe.title: Top-Shelf Margaritas
ingredients: 1 lime wedge for coating rims of glasses
Kosher salt for coating rims of glasses
instructions: Rub rims of 4 stemmed glasses with lime wedge and dip in salt to lightly coat. In a cocktail shaker, combine remaining ingredients and shake well. Strain drink into glasses and garnish with lime wedges.
